abstract.title: Copyright
abstract.para: First published in 202X by Hack the Edge Off.
Designed by Hack the Edge Off.
Produced using Dandelion, Clock and Echoes by John Tait.

preface.title: The Warrens series

Book 1: Warrens Witches Psionics. ISBN... (ABC). ISBN... (DEF).

preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: I wrote this novel to test a writing system called Echoes, a supplement to writing systems Clock and Dandelion.
